title: 84/315/EEC: Commission Decision of 30 May 1984 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Spectra Physics - Cw Dye Laser, model 375' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 30 May 1984
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Spectra Physics - Cw Dye Laser, model 375' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(84/315/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Spectra Physics - Cw Dye Laser, model 375', which is the subject of an application by the Federal Republic of Germany of 30 November 1983, may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 May 1984.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
